DOC.brief_summary: - Primary : To evaluate food effect pharmacokinetics ( PK ) single oral dose CJ-12420 healthy male subject . - Secondary - To explore food effect pharmacodynamics ( PD ) single oral dose CJ-12420 healthy male subject ( PD/PK group ) - To evaluate safety single oral dose CJ-12420 healthy male subject feed fast condition .
DOC.brief_title: Food-Effect PK PD Single Oral Dose CJ-12420 Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Male volunteer age 20 45 year old ( inclusive ) Body mass index ( BMI ) range 19 28 kg/m2 weigh least 50 kg ( inclusive ) Medically healthy clinically significant vital sign ( sit position blood pressure , pulse rate ) 1 . 90 mmHg ≤ systolic blood pressure ≤ 140 mmHg 2 . 50 mmHg ≤ diastolic blood pressure ≤ 95 mmHg 3 . 45 beat per minute ≤ pulse rate ≤ 95 beat per minute Understand requirement study voluntarily consent participate study Subjects exclude study evidence follow criterion : Last three criterion apply ONLY PD/PK group . History clinically significant gastrointestinal , renal , hepatic , neurologic , hematologic , endocrine , oncologic , pulmonary , immunologic , psychiatric , musculoskeletal cardiovascular disease condition , , opinion Investigator , would jeopardize safety subject impact validity study result History allergy sensitivity drug , include prior serious adverse reaction PPIs ( e.g . omeprazole , rabeprazole , lansoprazole ) History symptomatic GERD , erosive esophagitis , duodenal ulcer , gastric ulcer , Barrett 's esophagus ZollingerEllison syndrome , previous positive H. pylori The following criterion apply ONLY PD/PK group H.pylori positive , determined urea breath test Urine cotinine test positive Subject unable applicable pH meter catheter
